title: http://(tour|play).golang.org should use CodeMirror Go mode
body:
by **marijnh**: 
1. Go to one of the online Go editor environments
2. Note the tragic lack of syntax highlighting in the editor
3. Feel sad inside

A few months ago someone contributed a Go mode for CodeMirror
(http://codemirror.net/mode/go), which is the editor that's already being used on these
sites. It would probably be about five minutes of work to integrate it in the Go
websites (drop in the go.js file, set "mode" option to "go").
